mapper.sql: order_id,customer_id, customer_type, confidentiality_agreement, quote_end_date, main_process, quote_way, quote_freight_term, shipping_address1, shipping_address2, shipping_address3, invite_factory,invite_factory_name, invite_status, payment_term, quote_location, staff_number, qualification, order_status, create_time, update_time, publish_date,quote_remark,current_number, country,quote_purpose,quote_title,city,confidentiality_file_path,csg_order_id,equipment_keywords, product_keywords, drawing_path ,delivery_date,confirm_factory_id,no_pass_reasons,drawing_name,confidentiality_file_name, library_factory_id ,follow_status, inquiry_status,inspection_status,inspection_path,inspection_upload_time,quoter, initial_sales,follow_sales,contact_tel,price_assistant,quote_detail,total_amount,order_factory_name,order_end_date, follow_status_quotation, follow_detail,follow_time, quote_area, max_number

a.order_id, a.customer_id, a.customer_type, a.confidentiality_agreement, a.quote_end_date, a.main_process, a.quote_way, a.quote_freight_term, a.shipping_address1, a.shipping_address2, a.shipping_address3, a.invite_factory, a.invite_factory_name, a.invite_status, a.payment_term, a.quote_location, a.staff_number, a.qualification, a.order_status, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.publish_date, a.quote_remark, a.current_number, a.country, a.quote_purpose, a.quote_title, a.city, a.confidentiality_file_path, a.main_category, a.csg_order_id, a.equipment_keywords, a.product_keywords, a.confirm_factory_id, a.drawing_path, a.drawing_name, a.confidentiality_file_name, a.delivery_date, a.no_pass_reasons, a.is_equipment_list, a.library_factory_id

c.id as product_id , c.customer_id, c.order_id, c.product_name, c.materials, c.process, c.quantity_list, c.quantity_unit, c.annual_quantity, c.target_price, c.target_price_status, c.delivery_type,c.product_remark,c.weight,c.cgs_quotation_id
mapper.select: select * from quote_info_en where csg_order_id = #{csgOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_status != 3
mapper.update: update quote_info q,(select order_id from quote_info where csg_order_id = #{csgOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY order_id desc limit 1)a set q.order_status = 1 where q.order_id = a.order_id
mapper.select: select q.*,f.factory_name,s1.photo as sales_photo,s2.photo as quoter_photo,s1.short_name as sales_short_name, s2.short_name as quoter_short_name,s3.photo as assistant_photo,s3.short_name as assistant_short_name,s3.tel as assistant_tel, s3.qq as assistant_qq from quote_info_en q left join factory_info f on q.customer_id = f.factory_id left join sys_user s1 on q.initial_sales = s1.login_name left join sys_user s2 on q.quoter = s2.login_name left join sys_user s3 on q.price_assistant = s3.login_name where q.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update quote_info_en set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confidentiality_agreement = #{confidentialityAgreement,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quote_end_date = #{quoteEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, main_process = #{mainProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quote_way = #{quoteWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quote_freight_term = #{quoteFreightTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_address1 = #{shippingAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_address2 = #{shippingAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_address3 = #{shippingAddress3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_factory = #{inviteFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_status = #{inviteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_term = #{paymentTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quote_location = #{quoteLocation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, staff_number = #{staffNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, quote_remark = #{quoteRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from quote_info_en where 1=1
and order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by create_time desc

select count(order_id) from quote_info_en where 1=1
and order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}
